    NKF-Yayasan Buah Pinggang Kebangsaan Malaysia Vacancies DIALYSIS MANAGER (Based at HQ)

    October 24, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    NKF-Yayasan Buah Pinggang Kebangsaan Malaysia is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for DIALYSIS MANAGER (Based at HQ) position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    DIALYSIS MANAGER (Based at HQ)
    Responsibilities
    • To ensure safe, efficient and effective management of the daily operations of NKF Dialysis Centres.
    • To effectively supervise Centre Managers & Staff Nurses in-charge in carrying out their daily duties.
    • To ensure high quality patient care services are provided at NKF centres.
    • To conduct and assist in the investigation of complaints and report to the Secretariat
    • To ensure that the Standard Operating Procedures (SOP), Risk Management and Quality Controls are adopted and followed by all staff at NKF centres.
    • To reduce operating cost at NKF dialysis centres by monitoring the usage of consumables, medication, laboratory tests, RO water analysis and utilities.
    • To maintain a staff to patient ratio of 1: 6 i.e. 1 staff nurse and for every 6 patients.
    • To conduct 3 monthly visits to each centre outside Klang Valley and monthly visits to Klang Valley centres or as and when it is necessary.
    • To help plan and implement Continuous Medical Education (CME) and training such as Seminars and Workshops for medical support staff
    • To provide leadership, skill, supervision, training and updates to medical support staff.
    • To ensure discipline among medical support staff and that all activities run smoothly and efficiently.
    Requirements
    • Staff Nurse or Medical Assistant with Renal Nursing Certificate
    • At least 15 years working experience in dialysis with 10 years at Managerial level
    • Strong interpersonal skills and able to interact with all levels of people
    • Good team player
    • Excellent communication skills
    • Good presentation & organizational skills
    • Able to drive & possess own transport
    • Resourceful, creative & able to work independently with minimum supervision
    • Possess strong problem solving/decision making skills
    • Possess technical and medical knowledge on all related hemodialysis procedures and management of dialysis centres

    Company Overview

    We are an NGO that operates 28 dialysis centres which provide care  to 1500 patients nationwide, with over 400 staff. We are now seeking a committed and service oriented person to fill the position in our company.
    ABOUT NKF
    From our humble beginnings when we first registered in the year 1969, National Kidney Foundation of Malaysia (NKF) strives to raise the standards of care we provide to patients with kidney failure and those who are suffering from various kidney-related diseases. In 1993, we opened the doors of our first dialysis centre at Jalan Hang Lekiu, Kuala Lumpur. Over the years, NKF has grown tremendously with the support from many parties. NKF has expanded its role from being just a dialysis treatment provider, to becoming a one-stop national resource centre for all kidney-related matters.

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream hospital job in Petaling Jaya.
    Apply Online
